answers.answer: I have the same thing I just noticed... What became of yours?

ive had a hard mass inside the lips of my vagina to the left of my clit.. it was so large it almost felt like i was growing a second clit. mine was the same way as far as the surface... no signs of it at all just had to feel for it and it hurts when i sit wierd or lie on my side. not gonna lie the last time this was here i went to the doc and she said it could be from an std or ppl with diabetes get them. well it turns out the first time i had one i tested positive for clymidia (misspelled) but this time when i found it i went directly to the health department. i have been using condoms religiously and the tests came back negative. i woke up this morning and the lump was gone however im still going to the doctor to ask what all could b the causes and if i can expect a frequent visit from this painful pest. and what i should do about it i will try to come back with an explination

question: I'm 21 years old and yesterday while playing on my computer I absentmindedly touched at my bikini line and felt a bump under my skin. Needless to say, I immediately started to freak out. It's about the size of a pea, maybe a little bit bigger. You can't see anything on top of the skin, no blister, no discoloring any where, not even a red mark. The only way you would know that it was there was to feel it. Yesterday it tended to hurt a bit. Sometimes the pain was constant while other times it would just come and go, but the pain was never severe. I laid a hot washcloth on it later that night and haven't had that pain since, but the bump is still there. It's not an ingrown hair, I'm sure of that. Just wondering if anyone knows what this could be.
title: Lump under skin near bikini line
